SELECT HJ_BOARD.TITLE, HJ_BOARD.DESCRIPTION, HJ_BOARD.REG_DT, HJ_BOARD.TEXT_OPEN, HJ_BOARD.ANSWER, HJ_BOARD.ADMIN_ANSWER, HJ_BOARD.user, HJ_BOARD.P_ID, member.auth AS lv FROM HJ_BOARD JOIN member ON HJ_BOARD.USER = member.id
WHERE 1 = 1 AND HJ_BOARD.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
order by HJ_BOARD.REG_DT desc
LIMIT #{page}, 10
SELECT COUNT(HJ_BOARD.P_ID) as CNT FROM HJ_BOARD JOIN member ON HJ_BOARD.USER = member.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HJ_BOARD (TITLE, DESCRIPTION, REG_DT, TEXT_OPEN, ADMIN_ANSWER, user) VALUES (#{title},#{description},now(),#{text_open}, #{admin_answer},#{user})
